import React, { useContext } from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import classes from './Checkout.module.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faXmark } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import CartContext from "../../../store/cart-context"; import Bar from './Bar/Bar' const checkoutRoot = document.getElementById('checkout-root'); const Checkout = (props) => { const ctx = useContext(CartContext); return ReactDOM.createPortal(
props.onHide()} icon={faXmark} />

餐品详情

123

{ctx.totalPrice}

, checkoutRoot) } export default Checkout
